resources.string: We would like to thank you for downloading the Hymn App and using it, for it gives us encouragement and makes it possible for this app to be available for free.
This app was designed and developed by TAG in close collaboration with Zonse Media.
Hymn #%d has been added to favorites
Hymn #%d has been removed from favorites

We can assure you that our hymn book app is not designed to generate income through data sales or ads. The content is available to all users without charge. Your donation will be greatly appreciated as it helps us continue our mission and includes you in our community.
Tap to place temporary hymns for the present occasion
The For The Service list now includes Hymn #%d
